alert.note: Alert for Coshocton; Guernsey; Muskingum; Noble; Tuscarawas (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 19 at 5:46PM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...STRONG SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT WESTERN GUERNSEY...COSHOCTON... MUSKINGUM...WEST CENTRAL TUSCARAWAS AND WEST CENTRAL NOBLE COUNTIES THROUGH 630 PM EST... At 544 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong showers and thunderstorms along a line extending from near Danville to 6 miles northeast of Shawnee. Movement was east at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds in and near these showers could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Zanesville, Coshocton, New Concord, West Lafayette, Sugarcreek, South Zanesville, North Zanesville, Dresden, Frazeysburg, Baltic, Philo, and Warsaw. This includes Interstate 70 in Ohio between mile markers 145 and 175. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
